backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing unique inquiries, allowing submission and retrieval while preventing duplicates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and functionality of key frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color tokens and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component composing all marketing sections and layout elements.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with branding, navigation links, services list, and email/WhatsApp contact links.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky responsive header with navigation, email CTA, and WhatsApp dropdown for two phone numbers.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Contact section offering WhatsApp/email options and a validated inquiry form sent to the backend.
frontend/src/components/marketing/FaqSec: Renders an FAQ section using an accordion with predefined questions and answers.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HeroSe: Displays the hero section with headline, call-to-action buttons, a WhatsApp dropdown, and a hero image.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Proces: Shows a five-step process with icons and descriptions in a responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Lists service cards with icons, descriptions, and CTAs, plus a button to contact.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for managing Internet Identity login, state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitInquiryMutat: Defines a mutation that submits inquiries through the backend actor and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for theming, including light and dark mode palettes.
frontend/src/lib/brand.ts: Exports brand name and tagline constants.
frontend/src/lib/inquiryLinks.ts: Generates WhatsApp and email inquiry links with preset messages.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom fonts, color tokens, animations, and container settings using typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state, requirements, issues, and feature metadata for a business-focused marketing website build.
